Title: Prohibits operation of a motor vehicle on any highway in this state equipped with a radar device commonly known as a phazer II connected to a power source
Summary: Prohibits operation of a motor vehicle on any highway in this state equipped with a radar device commonly known as a PHAZER II connected to a power source; provides for use of rebuttable presumption.
LawCode: Amd ยง397-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to prohibition of radar detectors
